solution_line_template: The carton had {total_eggs} - {double_yolk_eggs} = <<{total_eggs}-{double_yolk_eggs}={single_yolk_eggs}>>{single_yolk_eggs} eggs with one yolk.
It had {double_yolk_eggs} eggs with double yolks, which added * {yolks_per_double_egg} = <<{double_yolk_eggs}*{yolks_per_double_egg}={yolks_from_double}>>{yolks_from_double} yolks.
Thus, there were {single_yolk_eggs} + {yolks_from_double} = <<{single_yolk_eggs}+{yolks_from_double}={total_yolks}>>{total_yolks} yolks in the whole carton.
